author: Special Correspondent
text:
The organs of a 20-year-old student, who was declared brain dead, were harvested and transplanted on patients in different hospitals.

Muthu Kumaran, a third-year student of SRM College, sustained a serious head injury while riding his motorcycle in Kattankulathur on Friday.

He was rushed to SRM hospital in Kattankulathur and later shifted to SRM Institutes for Medical Science, Vadapalani.

He was declared brain dead early on Sunday. After receiving consent from his parents, his kidneys were harvested and transplanted to patients there.

The heart and liver were sent to other hospitals while the corneas went to a patient at SRM Medical College Hospital.
title: Organs donated
